title: (x) The Melting Pot restaurant logo - ITC Stone Informal {Raph}
content:
Hi  
Please identify this font.  
Thank you so much.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207040756im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/type_3484.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "& Services" sans serif w/ unique ampersand - Blue Highway {Florian}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207040756/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38584 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Million Dollar 1950s script - Susie Q/Honey Script {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207040756/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38573 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content: [Stone Informal Semi](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207040756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/stone-informal/stone-inf-sem-semi/), artifically slanted. A shame, too, because it comes with a perfectly good true italic.
Thank you for identifying. If you want to know what this is from, it’s a part of The Melting Pot restaurant logo.
